name: Geode UI Tweaks
description: Tweak the Geode UI a bit more.

transparent-lists.name: Transparent Lists
transparent-lists.description: Makes the mod list background transparent. Best used with geode theme enabled.

list-bg-transparency.name: List Background Transparency
list-bg-transparency.description: Change the transparency of the background behind the mod list.

larger-logos.name: Larger Logos
larger-logos.description: Increases the size of the logos on mod items.

fix-mod-info-size.name: Fix Mod Info Size
fix-mod-info-size.description: Increases the width of the info container to extend all the way to the download count.
